title: Windows XP Pro SP3, Activated, +genuine, +sata, (July 2013)
description:
Windows XP Pro SP3, Activated, +genuine, +sata, (July 2013)
===========================================================
Plus software to create bootable USB and burn on CD/DVD
-----------------------------------------------------------

   - Key (serial) not needed (when installing or later)
   - Activated
   - Genuine proof (until v.42) = updateable; download from MS sites possible
   - SATA drivers integrated = can install on the new SATA/PATA HDDs, 
     not only on IDE/ATA (old HDDs)
   - Software to burn very easy on cd/dvd
   - Software to create very easy bootable usb stick
   - Software to generate and/or change your serial
   - All security updates until July 2013 integrated
   - Future updates can be added to a folder and installed optionally
     as offline updates with next installations
   - Additional info and screenshots - in info files in the torrent


Pure distribution !

   - Last XP SP3 original release, but activated
   - Language: English, Platform: 32 bit (x86)
   - No additional software installed
   - No viruses/malware/addware
   - No additional .NET frameworks installed
   - No additional codecs installed
   - No additional themes installed or set
   - No annoying cusomizations
   - Default windows shares disabled for better security
   - IExplorer is 6. Upgrade to IExplorer 8 can be choosed as option
   - Updated until July 2013 (only security updates)
   - Burn it easy on CD/DVD - software included!
   - Burn it easy on USB stick - software included!

ISO file hashes:
   - MD5  = 3fdda113f21cbd40290cedd77037d023
   - SHA1 = ed46de2e77b53a0189fc93f4915f64aeb8dfe8e2
   - CRC32= 2c4417dd

If you like this torrent, ***please comment*** & seed
Enjoy ;)
